mapper.select: select * from facility order by fa_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into facility(fa_bu_num, fa_name, fa_add, fa_add_detail, fa_phone, fa_locker,fa_toilet, fa_shower, fa_smoking, fa_machine, fa_note) values (#{facility.fa_bu_num}, #{facility.fa_name}, #{facility.fa_add}, #{facility.fa_add_detail}, #{facility.fa_phone}, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0)
